abstract: While Apple is exploring a full-fledged television, expect Siri, the company's new artificial intelligent software, to control the TV.
snippet: While Apple is exploring a full-fledged television, expect Siri, the company's new artificial intelligent software, to control the TV.
lead_paragraph: "I've finally cracked it!" Steven P. Jobs, co-founder of Apple, told his biographer, Walter Isaacson.

headline.main: What's Really Next for Apple in Television
